message.content:
I need to identify the cash payments for acquiring property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets from the cash flow statement.

In cash flow statements, these payments are typically listed in the "Cash Flow from Investing Activities" section. Looking at the statement, I can see a line item called "Purchase of Fixed Assets" which represents expenditures on property, plant and equipment.

The value for "Purchase of Fixed Assets" is 2496021.60, which appears on the date 2024-02-05.

This is the amount that represents cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '2496021.60'}}
```
